remarks: If three numbers are coprime, and the square of one is the product of the other two, then there is a formula for the other two in terms of ` gcd ` and square.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: coprimeprodsq $p |- ( ( ( A e. NN0 /\ B e. ZZ /\ C e. NN0 ) /\ ( ( A gcd B ) gcd C ) = 1 ) -> ( ( C ^ 2 ) = ( A x. B ) -> A = ( ( A gcd C ) ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
